english.segment1: ..Out from the darkened night, Into the burning hot cleansing steam..
english.segment2: My weak endeavour to stay clean;. From all the filth that I've gladly taken in. Failed escape from reality;. My soul lies unwanted with a stain of sin..
english.segment3: I feel myself impure;. I need the cleansing;. Craving for more of your love..
english.segment4: I feel myself unclean;. I need the cleansing;. Oh, wash me clean from these stains in me..
english.segment5: ..Out from the hot burning steam, Into the frozen cold granular snow..
english.segment6: The filth I've seen on my way;. Hasn't stain me like the evil from within. Evil deeds and words I say;. I've soiled my soul with a stain of sin..
english.segment7: I feel myself impure;. I need the cleansing;. Craving for more of your love..
english.segment8: I feel myself unclean;. I need your blessing;. Only you can clean these stains in me..
